snippet: After failed efforts to restore confidence in their sickly banks, European governments face growing pressure to give officials more powers to shore up shaky lenders.

byline.contributor: Raphael Minder contributed reporting from Madrid.

lead_paragraph: After failed efforts to restore confidence in their sickly banks, European governments face growing pressure to give officials more powers to shore up shaky lenders.

headline.main: Europe May Need More Power to Deal With Bank Crisis
headline.print_headline: Europe May Need More Power to Deal With Bank Crisis
